title: Dola Hill Stadium
text: Dola Hill Stadium is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Ndola">Ndola</a>, <a href="Zambia">Zambia</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and serves as the home for <a href="Forest%20Rangers%20Football%20Club">Forest Rangers Football Club</a>. The stadium holds 2300 people. It is located in a township called Dola Hill.
